        public boolean isExecutionInProgress()
        Returns:

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if Mongock runner is enabled and able to run, otherwise false

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the Mongo instance used by Mongock. This will close either the connection Mongock was initiated with or that which was internally created.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
